head.title: Apple Glazed Carrots with Bacon <r T>

directions.step:
*NOTE: Original recipe used regular bacon
Cook bacon slices in a small skillet over med heat until crisp. Remove bacon from skillet, and crumble. Add onion to bacon drippings in skillet, and saute 3 min. Add carrots, cider, sugar, and pepper, and bring to a boil. Cook mixture 10 min over med heat or until carrots are tender. Do not drain.
Place carrot mixture in a large serving bowl. Sprinkle with the reserved bacon and chives.
Yield: 8 servings
This was amazing!! Quite good, very easy and quick to put together.
NOTES : Cal 108.6, Fat 1.3g, Carb 23.2g, Fib 0.4g, Pro 2.2g, Sod 94mg, CFF 10.1%. Recipe by: Cooking Light, Nov/Dec 1997
